home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.tagline: Full Stack Freelancer - I build modern and high-performance web and mobile applications
home.bio: Full Stack Freelance Developer with over 3 years of experience in software development (web apps, mobile apps, and REST APIs). Creative, organized, and autonomous, I master object-oriented concepts and MVC architecture. Passionate about new technologies and AI, I adapt quickly and work effectively in teams. Available for short or long-term freelance missions.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Modern, responsive and accessible interfaces with React, TypeScript and the latest technologies.

backend.title: Backend Architecture
backend.description: Robust and scalable APIs, optimized databases and service integration.

about.philosophyText: I believe in clean, maintainable and well-documented code. Every project is an opportunity to learn and improve. I favor simple and elegant solutions over complex architectures.
